creditline: Gift of Ruth Lathrop Sikes in memory of her brother Bruce Sikes, 1967
medium: Woodblock print (benizuri-e), ink and limited color on paper
provenance: Ernest F. Fenollosa; David T. Ford (Aug. 1904-07); Ruth Lathrop Sikes (until 1967)
text: The actor Ōtani Hiroji as Tsuneyo in the play Hachinoki (Miniature Trees)
title: Actor Ōtani Hiroji as Tsuneyo
